QuestData.Title: Greatest of Threats
QuestData.Description:
Powerful djaradin and other creatures threaten both the Obsidian Citadel and the safety of my flight.
This cannot stand.
Help secure the area. Seek out and eliminate two of our most powerful enemies.
QuestData.LogDescription: Eliminate two rare enemies within the Obsidian Citadel or Slagmire.
